contact.title: Contact us
contact.content: For questions, suggestions or anything else, you can contact us by creating an issue on GitHub: Team Xerbutri GitHub

privacy.title: Our privacy declaration
privacy.content: We respect your privacy. This site is hosted by Vercel. This company registers anonymous visitor statistics, such as the number of visitors and their country of origin. No personal data is collected, and no cookies are used.
